title: MONDAY 2/22 - Panthers making a move for Deshaun Watson?
itunes:title: MONDAY 2/22 - Panthers making a move for Deshaun Watson?
description:
Carolina is clearing cap space to prepare for free agency. Is the Teddy Bridgewater era already over in Charlotte? Could they really land Deshaun Watson? The Bills are releasing linebacker Matt Milano and Deion Sanders is 1-0 as a college football coach.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
